TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
It's for "stup id", from a progressive, intellect-based, student qualification system,

Is question a kind of quest?

Yes. It is the quest for the Ion, a useful magical thing that can do so much.

Is a Questicon out to fleece you?

 

(side note: the person who started this thread hasn't been on the forum for over 7 years, That is the definition of "life of it's own")

Edited December 18, 2021 by ColdJ

Sye, hwy not?

As Santa rides the reindeers, what happened to the original indeers?

 

P.S.

(Yes, I know that "deer" doesn't have "-s", as it's a category, not an animal.

No matter, how many deer you have killed in Sherwood, even one is enough to get hanged. So, why bother with plurals).

Edited December 25, 2021 by kerbiloid

They died so that they could be reindeernated.

If somehow we actually create a new colony on Mars that survives, how long till interplanetary war?

Edited December 26, 2021 by ColdJ

None. It will be destroyed as soon as it had survived.

How many drogue chutes do the Voyagers have onboard to brake down in front of comets, stars, and dense hydrogen clouds?

Purple,

How do things do stuff?

The staff makes stuff, then sales make sales.

Is the staffordshire terrier some outroad horse carriage for employees from the Ford company?

No, it's a newspaper that reports all the terrifying goings on in Staffordshire county.

What is the next mutated variant going to be called?

It has already gotten its name in Russian, but the full word is violating the forum rules.

Have you read the Ancient Roman poet Covidius?

No, but his poems sound sick.

What are some of the practical applications of moose in space travel?

It can run over the Titan and Pluto snow.

Why not send Tatooin to Alderaan?

The death star can do that.

What about the droid attack on the wookies?

Goodnight!

The wookies would win. It's been done before.

How do you stuff a chicken in an oven willingly?

Put a road in-between the oven and the chicken, then make a corny joke.

ШНДЋ  ЇЗ С́ЎЯILLIЄ? 

What is Cyrillic?

 

Edited December 30, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman

OФ СОИЯСЕ!

Why is the night moon so huge in the movies?

Because it's a big block of cheese and they always hold it too close to the camera, or sometimes the actor's ego generates enough gravity to pull the moon closer to the Earth.

Who am I?
I dunno. Who are you?

All of thous.

How many speed does it take to jump overmoon?

Incorrect number of potatoes. Number is 836

How many cats dose it take to invade a country?

Countries are invented by humans to separate the catsm so the latter can't invade.

What are the cats always angry at each other?

Because they are jealous of each others Youtube subscribers.

I wish the translation program had better grammar and syntax.
A&Q: Isn't there a special another thread for the wishes in this forums?

It is 2022 and my brain is still booting up.

Why did I add so many mods to my brain?

(and yes there is another thread where you suspiciously state that you are human.)

Because you are mod-addicted.

Why do they ask "how do you do", but never "how do you while" or "how do you for"?

(Let alone the "how do you repeat" and "how do you until" for the Swiss speakers)

Because they want to know how you do the voodoo that you do so well.

What exactly is the goal that the human race is aiming for?
